title: ExpandableSectionToggle Props
description:
Acts as the toggle sub-component when the main expandable section component has the isDetached
property passed in. Allows for more custom control over the expandable section's toggle.

children.description: Content rendered inside the expandable toggle. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the expandable toggle.

contentId.description:
Id of the toggle's respective expandable section content. The value passed into this
property should match the contentId property of the main expandable section component.

direction.description: Direction the toggle arrow should point when the expandable section is expanded.

hasTruncatedContent.description: Flag to determine toggle styling when the expandable content is truncated.

isExpanded.description: Flag indicating if the expandable section is expanded.

onToggle.description: Callback function to toggle the expandable content. (Function: (isExpanded: boolean) => void)

toggleId.description:
Id of the toggle. The value passed into this property should match the aria-labelledby
property of the main expandable section component.
